entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 near midnight except gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
